item.title: ::donate command
item.dc:creator: @Ayush_Arya Ayush Arya
item.description:
@Ayush_Arya wrote:

[quote=“RyRyscape, post:1, topic:461832”]if (playerCommand.equals(“donate”)) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“My Link Here”, 12000);
c.sendMessage(“Any donation is appreciated!”);
}

When someone types ::doante in-game it sends them to a new tab. It doesn’t redirect them to the site I put in “My Link Here”. What did I do wrong?[/quote]the code sendframe stands for showing message not for redirecting… for redirecting launchURL is used,use my command with your message

if(inputString.equals("::donate")){ launchURL("Your Donate Page"); c.sendMessage("Any donation is appreciated!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: ::donate command
item.dc:creator: @sandy15 sandy15
item.description:
@sandy15 wrote:

make sure there is no http in the link

example;

http://www.google.com = wrong.
www.google.com = right.

item.title: ::donate command
item.dc:creator: @RyRyscape RyRyscape
item.description:
@RyRyscape wrote:

if (playerCommand.equals(“donate”)) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“My Link Here”, 12000);
c.sendMessage(“Any donation is appreciated!”);
}

When someone types ::doante in-game it sends them to a new tab. It doesn’t redirect them to the site I put in “My Link Here”. What did I do wrong?
